Hi Tien, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://talostone.com.au/the-journal/la-belle-by-jsh-projects-masterpiece-with-talostone-minq-zero-lord-white

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi Andy,

Sorry for the late response.
If you can please find a way around it that would be much appreciated.
As these journals go out to our sales reps to showcase to big designers, we would like to have them correct for sales and business purposes.
If there is something on our end that can assist please advise so I can also liaise with my sales team.

Best regards,



Tien
